headline.main: NYE TRIES TO GAG DOUGLAS ON WAR; Threatens Inquiry Into Mutual Life Unless Its Head Keeps Silent on Defense

lead_paragraph: Senator Gerald P. Nye of North Dakota issued a "warning" last night to Lewis W. Douglas, official of the New York Committee to Defend America, declaring that if Mr. Douglas did not maintain silence on national defense policy he would be haled before a Senatorial investigation into the business concern he heads.
